title: These cost HOW MUCH?! - Master & Dynamic MW75
description: Get your UGREEN Nexode 65W charger and use code 15GAN65W for an additional discount at:    Adam took a look at the new Master & Dynamic MW75 headphones to see if the $600 headphones stack up to the steep competitors in this price range, but can they dethrone the Airpods Max?  Check out the Master & Dynamic MW75:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something specifically for a video? Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Intro 0:39 Unboxing 1:47 Build quality and included accessories 2:56 Wireless Bluetooth adapter 4:00 Sponsor - UGREEN 65W Charger 4:32 Headphone features/specs 6:16 Fit and feel impressions 6:53 Included NSFW Assistant 7:18 ANC frustrations  9:25 Audio quality impressions 10:16 ANC testing and AirPods Max comparison 10:56 Headphone controls 11:38 Qualcomm AptX didn't work :( 11:47 Conclusion and M&D's competition 12:37 Outro
